name: Clothes Cupboard
description: Family's house is currently infested with bed bugs. Family's home furniture are affected. Family is looking for a new cupboard to store their clothes.  Do let me know if you require any additional information. Thank you!

name: Bed
description:
Family's house is currently infested with bed bugs. Family's home furniture are affected. Family is looking for a new queen  and single sized bed as they will have to dispose their current beds. 

Do let me know if you require any additional information.

Thank you!

name: single bed frame with mattress
description:
Patient is married with no children. Wife is the main caregiver thus unable to work to earn an income. Patient is also unable to work due to his own medical condition.
They are unable to afford to buy bed frame with mattress and also delivery charges.

name: Brand new mattress
description: Family of 7 living in a rental flat with a few young children. Family is looking for 2 brand new single-sized mattresses. New condition required due to sensitive skin condition.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description: Low income couple with 3 children (5, 3, 10mths baby). Father and mother both have developmental needs and working as cleaners. Requesting donation of a kitchen cabinet due to their financial difficulties (closed doors / drawers kind for kids safety). Appreciate for delivery arrangements to be covered by donor. Thank you!

name: Wardrobe
description:
The family of 8 are living in a 2-room rental flat. Husband is the sole breadwinner and wife is the primary caregiver to their premature 5 months old baby. The family is mainly dependent on SSO financial assistance to meet their basic needs. 

The family will require a brand new/second wardrobe as their existing wardrobe which received from donation 2 years ago is spoilt. 

The maximum dimension for the wardrobe should be H200cm x W160cm due to the space constraint. It would be a bonus if the wardrobe comes with more shelves compartment so that client could have more space to keep their clothes and belongings.

name: 4-door Wardrobe
description: Client is a frail woman who is undergoing divorce. She is the main caregiver to her son with special needs. Despite her employment, which is unstable, client is financially dependent on financial assistance. The family is hoping to receive any available 4-seater wardrobe. Due to family's financial circumstances, client is unable to afford the purchase of a wardrobe on their own. Kindly contact me at 98598768 for delivery address etc. Thank you.

name: Mattress
description:
Single Size Mattress needed for a single 62 lady moving to her rental unit. Client has eyesight problem and is unable to work. She requires a single mattress only as the public rental scheme only provides bed frame. Appreciate your kind help to this single lady. 

Please email me at huixian@newhopecs.org.sg or whats app / call at 80488854. We would need donor to send mattress directly to her rental unit as client has limited funds and is unable to afford delivery fees.

name: Dryper L Size x 5 Packets
description:
Client is a mother of 7 (F/15, F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/6 months). 
Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/6 months.
Client was previously unable to work due to gestational hypertension, and presently, she is the primary caregiver for the newborn. In addition, she underwent a cesarean section (c-section) when she gave birth on 30th August 2021, and is currently unable to do strenuous activities. Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day. As such, the family are limited in their financial resources and are unable to fork out money to buy daily items.

60x Halal Can Food [Meat -Sardine/Chicken etc] / [Vegetarian – Corn/Mushroom etc] 
40x Assorted Packet of Maggi Noodles [Chicken/Curry/Vegetarian]
40x Packets of Assorted Biscuits (example: Khong guan biscuits / Jacob)
30x Packets of 3-in-1 beverage  (Milo)

Any amount is appreciated! Please call / email me before making any purchase as we have space constraint issues. Thank you!

name: COVID-related Essential Cleaning Kits
description:
Due to the rapid rising community cases of COVID-19, quite a number of families are undergoing financial hardships. Currently, our beneficiaries under care of our centre, Community Services & Programmes, are in urgent need of 42 sets of cleaning kits (consisting of 2 disinfectant sprays, 1 box of disinfectant wipes, 3 child-friendly hand sanitizers). The families need to stay at home for quarantine that they are unable to go out for work. Meanwhile, the whole family members are affected and some of them will even have to spend their SSO money to purchase COVID-related essentials. 
 
The items can be delivered to our centre, Community Services & Programmes located at Block 529 Bedok North Street 3 #01-570, Singapore 460529. Please contact us at dik@childrensociety.org.sg for discussion of delivery arrangement.

name: 10 packets of frozen hotdogs
description: We are requesting for 10 packets of frozen hotdogs as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: Cleaning Products
description: Client is a 26 y/o single mother with two children. Due to childhood abandonment issues and a verbally abusive relationship with her adopted mother, client has developed a strong attachment to cats as they make her feel safe. This has resulted in client accumulating up to 40 cats. However, she is currently trying to sterilise all her cats and give most of them away as she is financially and physically unable to clean/care for all of them. It has been a challenge for client to afford cleaning products to clean the house and the cats' droppings have caused the house to have a strong odour. As such, she would greatly benefit from the donation of the following cleaning products: Dettol Antiseptic Germicide Liquid, Bleach, Jif Lemon Cream Surface Cleaner, Lifebuoy Botanitech™ Multi-purpose Disinfectant Spray, mop and broom and scrub
